channel.title: salt on VCoKaTA
channel.description: Recent content in salt on VCoKaTA

item.title: saltstack基础知识
item.description: 基础阶段 客户端配置好master地址后重启服务，在master段查看 [root@centosXnode1 ~]# salt-key -L Accepted Keys: Denied Keys: Unaccepted Keys: node01.cs1cloud.internal node02.cs1cloud.internal Rejected Keys: 接受客户端node01，node02 [root@centosXnode1 ~]# salt-key -a node01.cs1cloud.internal （a指定node节点名添加，A添加所以） The following keys are going to be accepted: Unaccepted Keys: node01.cs1cloud.internal Proceed? [n/Y] y Key for minion node01.cs1cloud.internal accepted. [root@centosXnode1 ~]# salt-key -L Accepted Keys: node01.cs1cloud.internal Denied Keys: Unaccepted Keys: node02.cs1cloud.internal Rejected Keys: [root@centosXnode1 ~]# salt-key -A The following keys are going to be accepted: Unaccepted Keys: node02.
